TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 向页分析器提供代码以便为控件属性赋值。

span.span: Provides code to the page parser for assigning property values on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类创建在页执行时检索资源的值的代码。The class creates code to retrieve resource values when the page is executed. 资源文件通常包含针对特定语言或区域性本地化的信息。A resource file typically contains information localized for a particular language or culture. 资源表达式的形式`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`页中。A resource expression takes the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` within the page. 冒号 （:） 的表达式的一部分指定的表达式生成器，若要使用，类型和冒号后面的部分表示的类名称和资源键。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression builder to use, and the part after the colon signifies the class name and resource key. 前面的表达式将从名为的文件中检索以下值`ClassKey.resx`:The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from a file named `ClassKey.resx`: ``` Hello! ``` 当页分析器遇到一个具有表达式`Resources`前缀，它创建的实例类。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `Resources` prefix, it creates an instance of the class. 类计算的表达式或生成代码以执行页时返回表达式的值。The class either evaluates the expression or generates code to return a value for the expression when the page is executed. 如果在将编译的页面中遇到这种表达式对象生成的代码，从资源文件中检索指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified value from the resource file. 如果在将未编译，页面中遇到这种表达式对象时将值返回从资源文件分析页面。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the resource file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从资源文件中检索默认货币。The following code example retrieves the default currency from a resource file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码会读取名为的资源文件的以下值`Financial.resx`App_GlobalResources 目录中。This code reads the following value from a resource file named `Financial.resx` in the App_GlobalResources directory. ``` US dollars ```

span.span: The object that represents information about the property bound to by the expression.

Returns a value from a resource file.

returns.span: 与通过分析得出的表达式关联的 。

span.span: An associated with the parsed expression.

returns.span: 通过分析得到的表达式包含类名称和资源键。

span.span: The parsed expression contains the class name and resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 形式的表达式时调用此方法`<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>`遇到在使用非编译功能页面中。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` is encountered in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 它从资源文件中的键/值对检索适当的值。It retrieves the appropriate value from a key/value pair in a resource file.

span.span: The property name of the object.
The parsed value of the expression.

summary.span: 返回在页执行过程中要计算的代码表达式。

span.span: Returns a code expression to evaluate during page execution.
A that invokes a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 CodeDOM 创建过程调用此方法为页或控件。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回对象的类型是和表示页执行期间检索资源值时要调用的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a resource value during page execution.

summary.span: 返回一个表示通过分析得出的表达式的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parsed expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分析该表达式并返回和在返回的属性值对象，如果在表达式中提供了这些属性。This method parses the expression and returns a and a property value in the returned object, if these properties are provided in the expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回属于类型。The returned is of type . 此方法将分析该表达式并返回和在返回的属性值对象，如果在表达式中提供了这些属性。This method parses the expression and returns a and a property value in the returned object, if those properties are provided in the expression.

span.span: The resource expression cannot be found or is invalid.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示表达式是否可在使用非编译功能的页中计算。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否方法已在类中实现。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必须在使用非编译功能页面中计算表达式的表达式生成器中实现。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 在非编译页中，支持的资源的值的计算，因此此属性总是返回`true`。 supports evaluation of resource values in non-compiled pages, so this property always returns `true`.
